div.div:
Features:
• Message persistence
• Ordering guarantees
• Partitioning
• Consumer groups
• Replay capability
• Dead letter queue

div.div:
✓ Loose coupling
✓ Scalability
✓ Flexibility
✓ Real-time processing
✓ Audit trail
✓ Replay capability
✓ Easy to add consumers
✓ Fault tolerance
